title: Stones River National Battlefield: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks      So you want to to teach your students about the Battle of Stones River, but you can't schedule a field trip or a ranger visit? Why not borrow our traveling trunk and use the same supplies and materials rangers use to present their programs?                  Stones River National Battlefield Traveling... Bring the Battle of Stones River into your classroom.           Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Stones River National Battlefield Stones River National Battlefield Traveling Trunks    Each trunk contains materials and activity guides that allow teachers to present their own classroom activities based on many of the park's curriculum based programs.    Type:Traveling Trunk Subjects:African American History and Culture, Civil War, Geography, Military and Wartime History, Reconstruction, Slavery, Social Studies
